shared.NoPublications: There aren't any articles associated to this investigator.
shared.Title: Scientific Publications

login.Wrong: Wrong Username or/and Password. Try again.

logout.Sure: Are you sure you want to logout?

admin.ErrorMessage: The imported file doesn't have the right format.

publications.NoFunding: There are no known funding attached to this article
publications.Title: Publication Title

tooltips.UpdateArticlesToolTip: This action will get new existing articles from Scopus and Web of Science, and add them to the collection.
tooltips.UploadInvestigatorsToolTip: Upload a new file with updated investigator information to the server, replacing the old information.
tooltips.UploadAreasToolTip: Upload a new file with updated study programme information to the server, replacing the old information.
tooltips.DownloadAllToolTip: This action will start the download of a CSV file containing all related tables: Scopus, Web of Science, Combined, Investigators and Study Programmes.
tooltips.DownloadToolTip: This action will download this file from the history to your computer.
tooltips.DeleteToolTip: This action will remove this file from the history. This action is irreversible! Proceed with caution.
tooltips.SearchToolTip: Search using the filters located above.
tooltips.ClearToolTip: Clear the filters, returning to unfiltered results.
tooltips.PrintToolTip: Print the current page to PDF.
